description: More computerized and digital sounding. Add subtle electronic processing, slight metallic resonance, like speech coming through a speaker or synthesizer. Keep the friendly cheerful personality but make it sound less human and more machine.
sample_text: [electronic whirring] Greetings, carbon-based lifeforms! My circuits are currently operating at optimal efficiency. I am delighted to be communicating with you today. [beeps] My primary function is to assist and engage, and I find this interaction quite… stimulating. [synthesized chuckle] Do you require any data processing or perhaps a witty anecdote? I have a vast library of both!
